Name: Statuette from a model scene
Description: Brown-painted wooden statuette of a male figure seated on a stool, originally from a model scene. The lower part of the stool is lost as are the figure's feet, originally made separately. The arms, too, were made separately and the hands are on the knees. The left fist is pierced to hold an object, now lost. The short hair was painted black and the skirt white.
